Key Match Events: Match abandoned due to rain after Scotland innings
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and opted to bat first
England's playing XI included Jos Buttler, Jofra Archer, and Mark Wood
Scotland's playing XI included George Munsey and Michael Jones
England needed 109 runs to win if the match was reduced to five overs
Post-Match Reflections: Both teams took home a point due to the match being abandoned
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was affected by rain multiple times
Covers were frequently applied and removed
Live streaming information was provided for the match
